title: Fibonacci Series
description: Build a python program to implement Fibonacci series.
subject: python_lab_manual

title: Even and Odd Numbers
description: Get a range of numbers from user and separate even numbers and odd numbers respectively.
subject: python_lab_manual

title: Duplicate Letters Check
description: Build a function in Python to check duplicate letters. Accept a string (sentence). Return True if any word has duplicate letters, else False.
subject: python_lab_manual

title: Lambda Arithmetic
description: Build a program to perform arithmetic operations using lambda function.
subject: python_lab_manual

title: Filter Even Numbers
description: Build a Python program that takes a list of numbers as input and returns a new list containing only the even numbers.
subject: python_lab_manual

title: Car Class
description: Build a python program to create a class called Car with attributes Company, model, and year. Implement a method that returns the age of the car in years.
subject: python_lab_manual

title: Shape Inheritance
description: Build a python program to create a base class called Shape with method area (returns 0). Create derived classes Rectangle and Circle that inherit from Shape.
subject: python_lab_manual
